name: Mayday (itch) (SilverEdgeGames, nebulexgame, SquidGuu)
description:
As a team of 4, your goal is to keep the SS Gearship afloat while being bombarded with enemy attacks. Can you repair the ships damages in time or will you crash to the ground?

This game is a more polished global game jam 2020 game.

You can use one keyboard and or 4 gamepads to play it. A round of the game take 3m 30second. Collect parts to repair broken sections of your ship


Credits
Programmers:

  • Chris Sullivan
  • Braden Gunther
  • Andrew MacKinnon

Artist:

  • Erik Iuhas @SquidGuu
